notes_display: Obv./ rev. blind spot, rev. flan cracks; Analysis by A.A. Gordus, University of Michigan 1974, by Neutron activation of streak
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Covered crown cap surmounted by covered korymbos; plain diadem; pendent diadem ribbons; cheek flaps; tunica; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h .l. o. mzdysn bgy 'rthštr-MRKAn MRKA 'ry'n MNW ctry yzd'n  | mazdēsn bay Ardašir šāhān šāh Ērān kē čihr az yazdān | "the Mazda-worshiping, divine Ardashir, King of Kings of the Iranians, whose image / brilliance is from the gods"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; square altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right mushroom-shaped bases supporting lion-paw structures; below left and right edge of altar table pendent diadem ribbon; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 3 h l.o. NWRA ZY, 3h l.a. 'rthštr | ādur ī Ardašīr | “the fire of Ardashir
issue_references_s: SNS 1 Phase 3 Group / Mint B "Hamadan" Type IIIb/3b, flame 2
